text: [Music]
hello I'm Jago a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Dublin today
I'm going to show you how to use AWS
assistance manager to join a running
Amazon elastic compute clo Windows
instance to your AWS directory service
domain let's get
started before doing this make sure that
you have an AWS directory service
directory and that the instance you want
to join meets the AWS instance manager
prerequisites after logging into the AWS
Management console navigate to the E2
console choose instances running and
select the easy to Windows instance that
you want to join to your AWS directory
service domain
under details confirm that you have the
AWS identity and access management role
with the required permissions attached
to the
instance you can use a roll with the AWS
Manas policies Amazon SSM Manas instance
score and Amazon SSM directory service
ACC access
attach open the AWS System Manager
console and then choose fleit manager
from the navigation pane to confirm that
your instance is managed by
SSM now that you confirm this select run
command from the navigation
pane then choose the orange button named
run
command search for the document AWS join
directory service
domain and then select the document from
the search
results complete the parameters required
by the document only the directory ID
and the directory name are
required you can optionally provide a
specific OU within your domain and the
DNS IP
addresses you can view this information
from your directory details section
within the AWS directory service
console under Target section select the
option choose instances manually and
select your easy to Windows instance in
the
list choose run
when the common status report success
you can see the output and verify that
your instance successfully joined the
domain e
thanks for watching and Happy Cloud
computer from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
